sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const STATUS_COLORS = { 'Kept':'bg-green-100 text-green-800','In Progress':'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800','Broken':'bg-red-100 text-red-800','Not Started':'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'} export default function DetailModal({ selected, onClose }) { return (

{selected.text}

{selected.status}

Category: {selected.category}

Source: {selected.source}

Last updated: {selected.lastUpdated}

) }
